paper_title: Non-linear Electrodynamics derived from the Kaluza-Klein Theory
abstract: The lagrangian of the Kaluza-Klein theory, in its simplest five-dimensional version, should include not only the scalar curvature R, but also the quadratic Gauss-Bonnet invariant. The general lagrangian is computed and the resulting non-linear equations which generalize Maxwell's system in a quite unique way are investigated. The possibility of the existence of static solutions is presented, and the qualitative behaviour of such solutions is discussed.
publication_venue: 15 pages, 6 figures. Conference paper, published in the Proceedings of Varna Summer School, "Infinite Dimensional Lie Algebras and Quantum Field Theory, World Scietific 1987
